TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Lood_no_Rosiya-Afohan, title = Lood_no_Rosiya-Afohan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lood_no_Rosiya-Afohan} }

S.FORM: Lood no Rosiya-Afohan Tomireng to kona Afohan Kalotamdawan Tang mitatoy to sakowan no kitakit, nikawrira palili'en no Amilika to payso ko Islam Sofitay mamifelih to aniniay a sifo, sapidipotaw to aniniay a sifo ko Rosiya i 1979 miheca 12 folad 24 romi'ad ocor han to ko sofitay a mitoker to nicokeran no Amirika a komi,na onini to ko sakala'aised no Rosiya ato Akirika, satapang sato ko lalood to mo'etep ko mihecan, 'aloman ko mahikedaay a kalotamdaw tona lalood, 1989 miheca sawad sato ko Rosiya a malalood nokay sanay to ko polong no sofitay.

Lood no Rosiya-Afohan Tomireng to kona Afohan Kalotamdawan Tang mitatoy to sakowan no kitakit, nikawrira palili'en no Amilika to payso ko Islam Sofitay mamifelih to aniniay a sifo, sapidipotaw to aniniay a sifo ko Rosiya i 1979 miheca 12 folad 24 romi'ad ocor han to ko sofitay a mitoker to nicokeran no Amirika a komi,na onini to ko sakala'aised no Rosiya ato Akirika, satapang sato ko lalood to mo'etep ko mihecan, 'aloman ko mahikedaay a kalotamdaw tona lalood, 1989 miheca sawad sato ko Rosiya a malalood nokay sanay to ko polong no sofitay.
